description: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history Author: Ilyas Ochkov, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Clear PowerShell History
query: ((powershell.file.script_block_text:(*del* OR *Remove\-Item* OR *rm*) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\(Get\-PSReadlineOption\).HistorySavePath*) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:*Set\-PSReadlineOption* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*–HistorySaveStyle* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*SaveNothing*))
